item.title: Proclamation of Gulf of America Day on February 9, 2025
item.description: This proclamation officially recognizes February 9, 2025, as Gulf of America Day. It acknowledges the significance of the date following the signing of Executive Order 14172, aimed at restoring names that honor American historical figures and events. The proclamation highlights the intention to commemorate the Gulf of America and its importance. Disclaimer: This content is AI generated. Use at your own risk. Please consult the original articles for accurate information.
